online.game
Class circBoard

java.lang.Object
  online.game.BaseBoard
      online.game.gBoard
          online.game.square_geo_board
              online.game.rectBoard
                  online.game.circBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
OnlineConstants
public abstract class circBoard
extends rectBoard

Base class for boards with radial symmetry. Rows are mapped around, Columns as radii. Other than the spacial transform, the board represention is just a square board.

Author:
ddyer
